parsed_response.methodology: The search approach involved querying industry association member lists (e.g., EU Specialty Food Ingredients, European Flavour Association, IFRA), trade publications, M&A databases, and company websites. Sources were cross-referenced to validate company details, ownership, revenue estimates, and product segments. Priority was given to companies with recent news, PE backing, or family ownership, and those explicitly mentioned in industry reports or association memberships.
